titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a shorte treatyse of contemplacyon taught by our lorde Jhesu cryste, or taken out of the boke of Margerie kempe of lyn[n].
titleStmt.author: Kempe, Margery, b. ca. 1373.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Enprynted in Fletestrete by Wynkyn de worde,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
